message.content:
{"id": "6009", 
"title": "Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes", 
"description": "When using the new class wizard in Build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor, the 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor, but is instead blank.", 
"OB": "The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.", 
"EB": "The 'Enclosing Type' field is blank when it should default to the current type in the editor.", 
"SR": "Update the new class wizard to correctly default the 'Enclosing Type' field to the current type in the editor."}

origin.input_content:
